name: Solitaire Cruise
description:
It's high time to take a break and relax after a hard-working day!

Solitaire Cruise.

This is an amazing card game that in a blink of an eye puts you to the atmosphere of sea cruise around the world. You will feel both the euphoria of a luxury journey and the excitement of card games

- Play your favourite Solitaire Tripeaks gameplay style absolutely free
- Enjoy colorful graphics and stunning views of challenging levels
- Discover a huge number of bonuses and mechanics along the way
- Collect stars, spin Lucky Wheel and win BIG rewards
- Visit fabulous Las Vegas, marvellous Paris, alluring Nassau and other spectacular places

A luxury liner is waiting for travelers and players who are ready to join a fascinating Solitaire Cruise around the world!
